hadiths.translation: Actions are but by intention and every man shall have but that which he intended.
Whoever brings dead land to life, it belongs to him.
No fatigue, disease, sorrow, or hurt befalls a Muslim, not even a thorn prick, except that Allah expiates some sins for that.
Prayer is the best thing that has been laid down. Whoever is able to do much of it, let him do much.
Charity does not decrease wealth, and Allah increases the honor of one who forgives.
